remarks: Shorter proof of ~ equsal .  (Contributed by BJ, 30-Sep-2018.)  Proof modification is discouraged to avoid using ~ equsal , but "min */exc equsal" is ok.  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-equsal.1 $e |- F/ x ps $.
bj-equsal.2 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
bj-equsal $p |- ( A. x ( x = y -> ph ) <-> ps ) $.
